Posts.Content: Oct 18, 2008 11:18PM Sunbunny wrote: Kimk1968,    I would call the doctor who ordered your mammogram and explain that you also are having pain in your armpit so that if at all possible the doctor can order an ultrasound of the underarm on the same day.  I had pain in my breast for some time without really noticing a lump.  I thought the pain was just due to my breasts being on the large size.  I had fibroids but the lump was definitely a different feeling and it was quite painful.    Soreness, pain and swelling can also come from hormonal changes but it is always best to check any pain with the doctor as you are doing.    Wishing you well.
